subject: [JUnit] Running JUnit from "main" method
msgSnippet: Someone pleeeease HELP. When I compile a code with these few lines : public static void main(String[] args) { junit.textui.TestRunner.run(suite()); } } it gets
messageBody:
Someone pleeeease HELP. When I compile a code with these few lines :
public static void main(String[] args) {
junit.textui.TestRunner.run(suite());
}
}
it gets compiled perfectly fine. But when I give: java <testcase name>
JUnit gives the following error.
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: HelloWorldTest
(wrong name: junit/samples/money/HelloWorldTest).
I simply can't figure out why.

Also somebody let me know how apply JUnit to swings & servlets.

Deepa A
